metadata.title: CVE-2024-8177 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 15.6 prior to 17.4.5, starting from 17.5 prior to 17.5.3, startingfrom 17.6 prior to 17.6.1 which could cause Denial of Service viaintegrating a malicious harbor registry.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
